name: Legend of Xunerath
description:
Saving and loading may not work in private browsers. Please use the windows download if loading does not work for you.Controls Arrow keysMove / Navigate menusZAttack / ConfirmEscapePause

You have been chosen by the goddesses to collect the 4 elements and restore the light to the fallen kingdom.. But will you be corrupted by the power along the way?

The in game font can be found here: https://jeremyoduber.itch.io/fonts-for-gb-studio
